title: Error "fx/defn expects a map of cofx as first argument got :url..." if scan QR code for bootnode
body:
### Description

[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
*Type*: Bug
[comment]: # (Describe the feature you would like, or briefly summarise the bug and what you did, what you expected to happen, and what actually happens. Sections below)
*Summary*: If scan qr code for bootnode from https://gist.github.com/jacqueswww/3ddfc5ecfa09ecea702744ab15a2200d then error is shown and bootnode address is not inserted. Error:
```
03-20 18:07:33.628 11632 11672 I ReactNativeJS: MESSAGE: fx/defn expects a map of cofx as first argument got :url in function function (e) {switch(arguments.length){case 2:return status_im.bootnodes.core.set_input.cljs$core$IFn$_invoke$arity$2(arguments[0],arguments[1]);case 3:return status_im.bootnodes.core.set_input.cljs$core$IFn$_invoke$arity$3(arguments[0],arguments[1],arguments[2]);default:throw Error(["Invalid arity: ",cljs.core.str.cljs$core$IFn$_invoke$arity$1(arguments.length)].join(""))}}
03-20 18:07:33.628 11632 11672 I ReactNativeJS: 
03-20 18:07:33.628 11632 11672 I ReactNativeJS: cljs$core$IFn$_invoke$arity$3@index.android.bundle:12:8282981

03-20 18:07:33.628 11632 11672 I ReactNativeJS: re_frame$router$IEventQueue$_run_queue$arity$1@index.android.bundle:12:1748235
03-20 18:07:33.628 11632 11672 I ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:12:1751415
03-20 18:07:33.628 11632 11672 I ReactNativeJS: re_frame$router$IEventQueue$_fsm_trigger$arity$3@index.android.bundle:12:1755626

```


#### Expected behavior
error message if code is invalid or url is inserted into address field
[comment]: # (Describe what you expected to happen.)

#### Actual behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what actually happened.)
error is scan qr code
### Reproduction
[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)

- Open Status -> Profile -> Bootnodes
- Turn on "Bottnodes enabled"
- Sign in -> Profile -> Bootnodes -> tap on QR icon inside Bootnodes address -> scan code og bootnode from https://gist.github.com/jacqueswww/3ddfc5ecfa09ecea702744ab15a2200d


* Status version: nightly 0.11.0
* Operating System: Android and iOS

#### Logs

[Status.log](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/files/2989320/Status.log)
